    • checkForCollision

      public void checkForCollision​(float elapsedTime, Camera cam)
      public method that checks for all possible collisions. This method should be called every update
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - the elapsed time
      cam - - camera is used to only look for collisions inside camera view

    • getExpandedPolygon

      public static GameObject getExpandedPolygon​(GameObject obj1, GameObject obj2)

      Parameters:
      obj1 - - object used to resize obj2
      obj2 - - object being resized
      Returns:
      expanded GameObject

    • getExpandedPolygon

      public static GameObject getExpandedPolygon​(GameObject obj1, GameObject obj2, float velX, float velY)
      Method that returns a expanded polygon object used for collision detection
      Parameters:
      obj1 - - object used to resize obj2
      obj2 - - object being resized
      velX - - change in velocity to compensate for moved object
      velY - - change in velocity to compensate for moved object
      Returns:
      expanded polygon object
